title: Receive Supplier Shipment
description: A shipment of goods arrives from a supplier. A warehouse worker must receive the goods and update inventory.

tasks.description: Retrieve the corresponding purchase order for the incoming shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct PO based on the supplier and packing slip.

tasks.description: Scan the items and count them to verify the quantities match the purchase order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that the quantities of all items received match the PO.

tasks.description: Update the inventory system to reflect the newly received stock.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully increases the on-hand inventory count for the received items.

tasks.description: Generate putaway instructions for the warehouse staff to store the items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list telling staff which warehouse locations to store the new items in.
